introduction: I am a fullstack web developer with a passion for turning ideas into functional digital products.
I live near Heilbronn and enjoy working in teams to create clean, well-thought-out web experiences.

about.heading: About me
about.subHeading: I am Annette Lasar, fullstack web developer
introduction: My path into software development was not straightforward – and that is exactly what makes it special. I bring analytical thinking, structured work habits and the ability to explain complex topics clearly – now applied to clean, functional web applications.
I enjoy exploring modern technologies and turning them into user-friendly solutions, with a clear focus on thoughtful design and mobile-first development.

description: Join is a Kanban app for organizing tasks and contacts. Tasks can be created, assigned to lists and moved between them.
The project includes user authentication as well as a guest access mode.
workflow: The development of Join is based on a predefined mockup created in Figma.
I first implemented the backend using Django to provide stable API endpoints for authentication, task management and contacts.
I then developed the frontend with Angular and ensured smooth integration between frontend and backend.
During development, I deliberately extended the backend to fully support all frontend requirements.

description: Videoflix is a streaming platform inspired by Netflix. Users can register, activate their account via email link and reset their password if needed.
The project includes video management with categories, automatic thumbnail generation and storage in multiple resolutions.
workflow: The focus was on the backend, as the frontend was predefined. A key aspect was authentication via email address instead of a username.
I first implemented the endpoints, tested them with Postman and wrote unit tests.
I then verified the frontend integration, especially authentication, account activation via email link, password reset and video delivery in different resolutions.

description: Coderr is a marketplace for developers, similar to Fiverr. Users can log in as customers or providers, create or request offers and sort them by various criteria.
The project was implemented using Django and includes pagination, sorting features and a REST API for integration with the predefined frontend.
workflow: Based on detailed API documentation, I systematically built the endpoints and tested them with Postman.
I then integrated the frontend and thoroughly tested the interfaces.
During project acceptance, the backend was validated using automated tests.

description: This game was developed as part of the training program using vanilla JavaScript. The goal: help the mermaid collect pearls and stars, defend against hostile sea creatures and ultimately find the golden key to open the treasure chest.
The entire game is based on object-oriented programming with clearly separated classes for the player character, enemies, objects and game logic.
workflow: As no template or detailed specification was provided, I designed and developed the game step by step.

I created, tested and refactored functions and classes iteratively – a process that significantly deepened my understanding of OOP and game mechanics. The visual design was largely developed alongside the code, as the project allowed a lot of room for creative decisions.

description: The Pokédex is an interactive web application that provides an overview of various Pokémon. Data such as name, type and image is loaded from a public API and presented in a user-friendly way.
The project demonstrates working with REST APIs and basic DOM manipulation, including fetching data, rendering results and dynamically creating a detailed view for each Pokémon.
workflow: There was no mockup for the Pokédex – I developed the design based on examples found online.
I implemented fetching and displaying 20 Pokémon and designed their cards. I then extended the application to load additional Pokémon dynamically.
After designing the detail views, I implemented a search function that allows users to search for specific Pokémon.

feedbackInfos.feedbackText: Thank you very much, Annette, for your detailed video – it was really helpful.
Annette helped me tremendously with Angular. Thanks to her clear explanations of complex concepts, I was finally able to make real progress. Her support was a true game changer for my project.
I just completed the challenge. Your explanation is really great – thank you!

Annette impresses both professionally and personally. Her attention to detail and deep understanding of programming principles shape her structured way of working. When asked for help, she explains concepts clearly and logically. She is a true team player who enjoys sharing her knowledge and guiding others to the most logical solution with ease and confidence.

Annette stands out for her exceptional curiosity and deep thirst for knowledge, which is reflected in her habit of questioning everything while coding in order to fully understand relationships and continuously learn. She consistently contributes innovative ideas to improve processes and projects. Her willingness to take responsibility and support others is impressive. She is an extremely helpful colleague who generously shares her knowledge and makes even complex topics easy to understand. Her strong didactic skills significantly contribute to the team’s growth and a positive learning culture. I can recommend Annette without reservation.

During my part-time training as a programmer, Annette was a great support. She openly shared her expertise and helped me get started in practice with patience and clarity. Her structured approach and calm, supportive manner gave me confidence and inspired me both professionally and personally. I experienced her as a highly competent and very pleasant colleague.

Annette is a frontend and backend developer who enjoys writing good code and sharing knowledge. She is highly skilled in both areas and gladly helps others – whether through instructional videos or direct support, without expecting anything in return. Clean code, clear structures and efficient workflows are important to her. She approaches challenges with enthusiasm and brings heart and responsibility to her projects. Continuous learning and growth are simply part of who she is.

cv.heading: Curriculum vitae
cv.introductionTillNow: Professional training as a fullstack web developer at Developer Akademie
cv.introductionCarreer: Many years of professional experience in didactics, communication and project organization

responsible.title: Data controller
responsible.text: The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:
